医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
MassiveFold 通过高效的并行处理推进蛋白质结构预测研究人员开发了 MassiveFold，这是一种针对并行处理进行优化的增强型 AlphaFold 版本，可将蛋白质结构预测速度从数月缩短至数小时，同时增加结构多样性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/MassiveFold-advances-蛋白质-结构-预测-with-efficient-parallel-processing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/MassiveFold-advances-蛋白质-结构-预测-with-efficient-parallel-processing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=213cca03-c4ea-4a4c-a411-62c5f2ae222a Tue, 12 Nov 2024 21:42:00 -0500 MassiveFold advances protein structure prediction with efficient parallel processing
电子衰弱指数经验证可预测老年人的健康并发症一篇新的研究论文于2024年10月24日发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 20 期，标题为“Development”以及在国家健康维护组织中验证电子脆弱指数。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Electronic-frailty-index-validated-for-predicting-health-complications-in-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Electronic-frailty-index-validated-for-predicting-health-complications-in-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd9e1df2-7f0d-4ea7-b712-fc179a27bdef Tue, 12 Nov 2024 19:35:00 -0500 Electronic frailty index validated for predicting health complications in seniors
研究揭示了为什么白蘑菇可能有助于预防前列腺癌进展City of Hope 是美国最大、最先进的癌症研究和治疗组织之一，其研究人员被《美国新闻与世界报道》评为全美前 5 名癌症中心，并且在为癌症患者提供最佳治疗方面处于全国领先地位。课程，综合支持性护理计划，现在了解为什么服用研究性白蘑菇补充剂有望减缓甚至预防前列腺癌在参加研究“食品作为药物”的二期临床试验的男性中的扩散。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Study-uncovers-why-white-button-mushrooms-may-help-prevent-prostate-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Study-uncovers-why-white-button-mushrooms-may-help-prevent-prostate-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69b7e285-1258-4018-9048-b1ff8d5b07a1 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 19:28:57 -0500 Study uncovers why white button mushrooms may help prevent prostate cancer progression
研究为杯状细胞的核心作用提供了新的见解在最近的一项研究中，加州大学圣地亚哥分校的研究人员对杯状细胞（肠道内的特殊细胞）在维持胃肠道 (GI) 内健康和平衡的免疫环境中的核心作用提供了新的见解。道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Study-provides-new-insights-into-the-central-role-of-goblet-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Study-provides-new-insights-into-the-central-role-of-goblet-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a5074ae-711a-4202-8175-e39f5ab79717 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 19:15:44 -0500 Study provides new insights into the central role of goblet cells
持续参加医疗补助可降低晚期淋巴瘤诊断的风险持续参加医疗补助与儿童和青少年/年轻人 (AYAs) 晚期淋巴瘤诊断率较低相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Continously-Medicaid-enrollment-linked-to-lower-risk-of-late-stage-lymphoma-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Continously-Medicaid-enrollment-linked-to-lower-risk-of-late-stage-lymphoma-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7ea9eb5-4727-460a-a51e-94b8519f68e4 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 19:11:10 -0500 Continuous Medicaid enrollment linked to lower risk of late-stage lymphoma diagnosis
实用工具有助于预测静脉中风患者的癫痫风险哥德堡大学和其他大学的一项研究提出了一种实用的计算器，可以预测静脉中风后癫痫的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Practical-tool-helps-predict-epilepsy-risk-in-venous-中风-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Practical-tool-helps-predict-epilepsy-risk-in-venous-中风-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd0b70a7-ca9d-499c-ac65-2382950f759e Tue, 12 Nov 2024 18:54:55 -0500 Practical tool helps predict epilepsy risk in venous stroke patients
社区主导的干预措施遏制儿童肥胖并提高生活质量RESPOND 试验通过转向集群并行随机设计来适应 COVID-19 的干扰，尽管大流行对学校和社区参与率产生了影响，但仍然可以进行分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Community-led-intervention-curbs-childhood-obesity-and-boosts-quality-of-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Community-led-intervention-curbs-childhood-obesity-and-boosts-quality-of-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee353593-e837-4d9b-a7f3-7d29c1493fe5 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 18:52:00 -0500 Community-led intervention curbs childhood obesity and boosts quality of life
小颅神经肿瘤的早期放射外科手术可以预防未来的并发症患有可导致听力损失、眩晕、不平衡和耳鸣的小型颅神经肿瘤的患者通常会被观察而不是主动治疗，因为人们认为早期干预的风险大于益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Early-radiosurgery-for-small-cranial-nerve-tumors-can-prevent-future-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Early-radiosurgery-for-small-cranial-nerve-tumors-can-prevent-future-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4baccbb-e1ee-43f9-bb90-7b5e567e87c5 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 18:46:38 -0500 Early radiosurgery for small cranial nerve tumors can prevent future complications
新的生物标志物可以帮助预测帕金森病的进展来自巴塞罗那大学和 Bellvitge 生物医学研究所 (IDIBELL) 的一组研究人员发现了帕金森病进展的潜在生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/New-biomarker-could-help-predict-Parkinsone28099s-disease-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/New-biomarker-could-help-predict-Parkinsone28099s-disease-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c7b30d1-35cb-43dd-86d3-40dff1690e70 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 18:40:00 -0500 New biomarker could help predict Parkinson’s disease progression
芬兰癫痫护理途径为医疗保健系统树立了基准芬兰癫痫护理途径已发表在 Epilepsia Open 上。这种芬兰癫痫护理模式提供了一种简化的多学科方法来诊断和治疗癫痫，并结合了现代数字工具、数据共享和同行支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Finnish-epilepsy-care-pathway-sets-benchmark-for-healthcare-systems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Finnish-epilepsy-care-pathway-sets-benchmark-for-healthcare-systems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=992dced6-c911-406d-9117-0516bf3469e1 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 18:35:14 -0500 Finnish epilepsy care pathway sets benchmark for healthcare systems
